author: rhuijben
msg: Provide a nicer error when committing fails because some modified node is
locked in another working copy.
This provides the information on which file is locked for the ra_local,
ra_neon and ra_serf and on some (but not all) ra_svn commits.
(In lock_tests.py#1 the failure of committing the changes to iota
are report only on the editor->close_edit()).
AnkhSVN can't diagnose SVN_ERR_RA_DAV_REQUEST_FAILED without a bit of help
from the lower layers and better error messages are nice for everybody.
* subversion/include/svn_error_codes.h
(SVN_ERR_CLIENT_NO_LOCK_TOKEN): New error code.
* subversion/include/svn_wc.h
(svn_wc_notify_action_t): New value.
* subversion/libsvn_client/commit_util.c
(fixup_out_of_date_error): Handle lock errors like how we handle out of date.
(svn_client__do_commit): Add svn_error_return().
* subversion/libsvn_ra_neon/commit.c
(commit_close_file): Handle lock errors explicitly instead of as a generic
dav failure to allow lower layers to provide a better error message.
